filmography.title: Safety Last!
filmography.role_description: A department store clerk who climbs a skyscraper to win money and the girl he loves; features the iconic clock tower scene.
filmography.plot: A store clerk organizes a publicity stunt in which a friend climbs the outside of a tall building, but circumstances force him to make the perilous climb himself.

filmography.title: The Freshman
filmography.role_description: A naive college freshman who tries to become popular by joining the football team.
filmography.plot: A nerdy college student will do anything to become popular on campus, eventually getting his chance to shine during the big football game.

filmography.title: Speedy
filmography.role_description: A baseball-obsessed city boy who tries to save the last horse-drawn streetcar in New York City.
filmography.plot: A young man loses his job but finds a new purpose in saving his girlfriend's grandfather's streetcar business from a corrupt monopoly.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination â€“ Best Director (Ted Wilde)

filmography.title: The Kid Brother
filmography.role_description: The gentle youngest son of a sheriff who must prove his toughness to his father and brothers.
filmography.plot: The weakling son of a legendary lawman tries to earn his father's respect by tracking down a thief who stole money entrusted to the family.

filmography.title: Girl Shy
filmography.role_description: A shy tailor who writes a book on how to woo women, despite being terrified of them.
filmography.plot: A man with a stutter writes a guide to romance, then must race across the city to stop the girl he loves from marrying a bigamist.

filmography.title: Grandma's Boy
filmography.role_description: A cowardly young man who finds courage through a magic charm given to him by his grandmother.
filmography.plot: A timid boy is tricked by his grandmother into believing he has a magic charm that gives him immense strength and bravery.

filmography.title: Why Worry?
filmography.role_description: A wealthy hypochondriac who travels to the tropics for his health and stumbles into a revolution.
filmography.plot: A rich businessman obsessed with his health gets caught in a South American revolution and, with the help of a giant, helps end the war.

filmography.title: Dr. Jack
filmography.role_description: A country doctor who uses common sense and kindness to cure his patients.
filmography.plot: A cheerful country doctor heals patients with common sense but faces a challenge when he tries to cure a sick little girl with a gloomy doctor.

filmography.title: For Heaven's Sake
filmography.role_description: A wealthy playboy who accidentally funds a mission and falls for the minister's daughter.
filmography.plot: A millionaire unknowingly funds a downtown mission and tries to win the heart of the girl who works there.

filmography.title: Hot Water
filmography.role_description: A husband who struggles with domestic life, in-laws, and a new car.
filmography.plot: A newlywed husband deals with a meddling mother-in-law, a lazy brother-in-law, and a turkey he won in a raffle.

filmography.title: A Sailor-Made Man
filmography.role_description: A wealthy idler who joins the navy to prove himself worthy of the girl he loves.
filmography.plot: A rich young man joins the navy to impress his girlfriend's father and ends up rescuing her from a Maharajah.

filmography.title: Welcome Danger
filmography.role_description: A botany student who becomes a detective in Chinatown; Lloyd's first sound film.
filmography.plot: A botany student is called to San Francisco to take over his late father's role as police chief and investigates a Chinatown mystery.

filmography.title: Feet First
filmography.role_description: An ambitious shoe salesman who finds himself dangling high above the city streets.
filmography.plot: A shoe salesman pretends to be a wealthy tycoon to impress a girl, leading to a perilous adventure on the side of a building.

filmography.title: Movie Crazy
filmography.role_description: A clumsy aspiring actor who goes to Hollywood and accidentally wreaks havoc at a studio.
filmography.plot: A film-struck young man travels to Hollywood to become an actor and gets mixed up in a real movie production.

filmography.title: The Cat's-Paw
filmography.role_description: A naive missionary's son who becomes the accidental mayor of a corrupt city.
filmography.plot: A missionary's son returns to America and is duped into running for mayor, but he uses Chinese wisdom to clean up the town.

filmography.title: The Milky Way
filmography.role_description: A timid milkman who accidentally knocks out a boxing champion and is promoted as a fighter.
filmography.plot: A milkman becomes an unlikely boxing contender after a lucky punch, facing the champion in the ring.

filmography.title: Professor Beware
filmography.role_description: An Egyptologist who believes he is the reincarnation of an ancient cursed lover.
filmography.plot: An archaeologist fleeing a murder charge travels cross-country, believing he is cursed by an ancient Egyptian prophecy.

filmography.title: The Sin of Harold Diddlebock
filmography.role_description: A middle-aged version of his character from 'The Freshman' who goes on a wild adventure after losing his job.
filmography.plot: After being fired from his job of 20 years, a mild-mannered man goes on a drinking binge and buys a circus.

filmography.title: Never Weaken
filmography.role_description: An industrious young man who helps his girlfriend's doctor boss drum up business.
filmography.plot: A young man tries to help his girlfriend's medical practice by drumming up patients, leading to a perilous construction site stunt.

filmography.title: From Hand to Mouth
filmography.role_description: A penniless young man who teams up with a waif to survive the streets.
filmography.plot: A penniless man and a young girl try to survive on the streets and help an heiress claim her inheritance.

filmography.title: Bumping Into Broadway
filmography.role_description: A playwright who spends his last dime to help an actress pay her rent.
filmography.plot: A struggling playwright accidentally wins big at a gambling club and tries to help an aspiring actress.

filmography.title: Get Out and Get Under
filmography.role_description: A young man who struggles with his new automobile while trying to get to his amateur theatrical performance.
filmography.plot: A young man has a series of mishaps with his new car while trying to get to a play on time.

filmography.title: Number, Please?
filmography.role_description: A jilted lover who tries to win back his girl at an amusement park.
filmography.plot: A young man tries to win back his girl from a rival at a crowded amusement park, dealing with lost purses and balloons.

filmography.title: Haunted Spooks
filmography.role_description: A man who agrees to spend a year in a haunted house with a girl to help her claim an inheritance.
filmography.plot: A young man and woman must live in a spooky mansion for a year to inherit it, while others try to scare them away.

filmography.title: An Eastern Westerner
filmography.role_description: A pampered New York youth who is sent out West to toughen up.
filmography.plot: A city boy is sent to a rough western town by his father, where he outwits the local bully and saves the girl.
